explanation: [0-0] A young boy is standing in front of the blackboard at the front of a classroom, the walls of the classroom are purple and there is a bookshelf against the wall. He is wearing a red sweater and brown pants. He is finishing writing a math problem "-5+3 =" .

[0-8] A man's hand reaches out and takes the chalk from the boy. The scene changes to the man frowning at the chalk, he is wearing a blue baseball cap backwards and a yellow shirt. The man looks at the chalk and then at the blackboard. The scene changes to a hand drawing five vertical bars below the "5" on the blackboard, then the finger points to the "3" on the blackboard and draws three plus signs below it.
